name: Tabletop Terrorism
description:
YOU NEED TO BE FULLSCREEN - BUTTON IN BOTTOM RIGHT

Tabletop Terrorism is an action-packed 3D top down shooter where you need to use positioning and tactics to blast your way through waves of enemies.

You play as a dice. The value of the dice is how much damage you deal. Dodge enemy attacks while also maximizing damage output to rise to the top!

Every 3 waves you have the option to claim a power up. Either choose a specific one at the expense of 1 HP, roll for a random one for free, or skip to the next wave to guarantee +1 HP.

CONTROLS

-WASD to move

-Left click to shoot

created by Caden Oestrich and Nathan Wong
